LanguageData.ThingDefFishSduiggles.label: 낙지
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSduiggles.description: Found in the swamps and shallow waters. Behind the appearances, this kind of squid is very affectuous and intelligent. Who would like to fish it? You monster
LanguageData.Meat_ThingDefFishSduiggles.label: 낙지 tentacles
LanguageData.Corpse_ThingDefFishSduiggles.label: 낙지 시체
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSeasnake.label: 장어
LanguageData.ThingDefFishSeasnake.description: Often mistaken for its wild 아나고 cousin, this peaceful fish is often caught during moonless nights.
LanguageData.Meat_ThingDefFishSeasnake.label: 장어 회
LanguageData.Corpse_ThingDefFishSeasnake.label: 뱀장어 시체
LanguageData.ThingDefFishMashgon.label: 곰장어
LanguageData.ThingDefFishMashgon.description: A medium shellfish often found in the swamps and marshes. Its name comes from the local tribespeople calling it "marsh dragon". Easy to catch and fast to breed, this is a good basic protein source. Not really nourishing but really tasty, it can be grilled for a better flavour.
LanguageData.Meat_ThingDefFishMashgon.label: shelled 곰장어
LanguageData.Corpse_ThingDefFishMashgon.label: 곰장어 시체
LanguageData.ThingDefFishBlueblade.label: 블루돔
LanguageData.ThingDefFishBlueblade.description: A very common fish found in shallow water. Its name comes from its resilience: it is able to live both in hot blue lagoons or in icy blue waters.
LanguageData.Meat_ThingDefFishBlueblade.label: 블루돔 회
LanguageData.Corpse_ThingDefFishBlueblade.label: 블루돔 시체
LanguageData.ThingDefFishTailteeth.label: 아나고
LanguageData.ThingDefFishTailteeth.description: This ferocious predator owns its name to its vicious tactics. Slowly approaching its unaware drinking preys, it uses its massive 꼬리 to attract them into deep water. The teeth is generaly the last vision you can get from this terrible creature.
LanguageData.Leather_ThingDefFishTailteeth.label: 아나고 가죽
LanguageData.Meat_ThingDefFishTailteeth.label: 아나고 steak
LanguageData.Corpse_ThingDefFishTailteeth.label: 아나고 시체
